Class ec.e.hab.Unit 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.hab.HaberdasheryObject
           |
           +----ec.e.hab.Unit
public class Unit
extends HaberdasheryObject
A Haberdashery directory unit. A unit maps from names (which are Strings) to DirectDesignators for the things pointed to by the unit. By entering the DirectDesignators of other Units into a Unit, you can create a hierarchical namespace.

Unit()
Construct an empty unit.

copyWith(String, DirectDesignator)
Construct a new unit with an additional or changed entry.
copyWithout(String)
Construct a new unit with an entry deleted.
designators()
Enumerate the Designators this Unit maps to.
get(String)
Fetch an entry from the unit.
isDetermined()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is determined (it is).
isSpecified()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is specified (it is).
names()
Enumerate the names this Unit maps from.

Unit 
  public Unit()
Construct an empty unit.

get 
  public DirectDesignator get(String name)
Fetch an entry from the unit.
Parameters:
name - The name that you want to look up.
Returns:
The DirectDesignator that the name maps to.
copyWith 
  public Unit copyWith(String name,
                       DirectDesignator entry)
Construct a new unit with an additional or changed entry.
Parameters:
name - The name you want to add.
entry - The DirectDesignator that the name should map to.
Returns:
A copy of the unit with the indicated entry.
copyWithout 
  public Unit copyWithout(String name)
Construct a new unit with an entry deleted. It is an error if the unit does not already map this name.
Parameters:
name - The name whose mapping you want to remove.
Returns:
A copy of the unit with the indicated entry deleted.
designators 
  public Enumeration designators()
Enumerate the Designators this Unit maps to.
Returns:
An Enumeration of the Unit's (Direct)Designators.
Overrides:
designators in class HaberdasheryObject
names 
  public Enumeration names()
Enumerate the names this Unit maps from.
Returns:
An Enumeration of the Units names.
isDetermined 
  public boolean isDetermined()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is determined (it is).
Returns:
true: Units are always determined
Overrides:
isDetermined in class HaberdasheryObject
isSpecified 
  public boolean isSpecified()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is specified (it is).
Returns:
true: Units are always specified
Overrides:
isSpecified in class HaberdasheryObject
